Our Agenda

  1. Create a quick CRUD application
  2. Run the application locally
  3. Deploy to the cloud
Getting started
Getting started sucks
Integrating stuff is hard
Repetitive tasks
  • are annoying
  • are frustrating
  • will make you crazy

So what do we do about it?

  • We could google it?

No!

WTF is JBoss Forge?

Forge is a core framework for rapid-application development in a standards-based environment. Plugins / incremental project enhancement for Java EE, and more.
forge $   get-started   █
JBoss Tools (http://www.jboss.org/tools)
  • @XmlTransient must go on getter methods
  • rest setup
  • rest endpoint-from-entity
  • 
        Add some code
      
    • 
    

  





  

    
      
    
  

  

    
What is OpenShift?

    
OpenShift is Red Hat's PaaS offering.

    
You can write code in:

    
    
      
  • Java (JBoss AS 7 or EAP 6)
    • 
      
  • Ruby (TorqueBox)
    • 
      
  • Node.js
    • 
      
  • Python
    • 
      
  • PHP
    • 
      
  • Perl
    • 
    

    

      https://openshift.redhat.com/
    

  

  

    

      rhc $  
      get-started
